banking.question: Select the difference between a Checking and Savings bank account?
banking.option1: A checking account doesn't earn interest while a savings account does
banking.option2: Savings accounts have higher interest rates than checking accounts
banking.option3: There could be monthly withdrawal restrictions on Savings accounts

banking.question: Can I use my debit card to withdraw cash from an ATM ?
The interest rate on your savings account is 1% per year and inflation is 2% per year. After a year, would the money in the account be able to:
